name: FishTrotter
description:
This game is a mix of different classics.

The idea came from observing my gold fish. 

I made it also to increase my knowledge as a solo game developer and pixel artist.

Originally this was a try out for google play. The application is been reviewed.

As a gamer, I hate ads and in app-purchases so this is free for you to play. 

If you want, just give an honest review and feedback to help me become a better developer.
